name: Potentially compromised account
description: This rule looks for a successful SSH login, followed by the use of curl to attempt accessing an unresolvable URL, followed by the creation of a file
query:
sequence
      [ authentication where event.dataset == "auditd.log" and auditd.log.op == "login" and event.outcome == "success"]
      [ process where process.name == "curl" and process.args in ("www.malicious-site.com", "www.candc.biz")]
      [ file where process.name == "bash" and event.type=="creation" and file.extension in ("txt", "xml", "zip")]
